title: Roast beef with Yorkshire puddings, roast potatoes and gravy
description: This most traditional of dishes uses duck fat to add extra meatiness to the roasties. The red wine-soaked gravy will also have you going back for more
prep time: 25 minutes, plus resting time for the batter
cook time: 1½ - 2 hours, plus resting time for the beef
ingredients: 800ml/1 pint 7fl oz milk (you may not need all of it)
2.5kg/5½lb oven-ready rib of beef on the bone
a drizzle of vegetable oil or 2 tsp duck fat
16 medium-sized Maris Piper or King Edward potatoes (each about 175g/6oz), peeled, cut into equal-sized pieces
